# preferredVolume

**Instance Property**

The preferred volume for the audible medata data of the track.

## Declaration

```swift
var preferredVolume: Float { get set }
```

## Accessing audible characteristics

- **hasAudioSampleDependencies**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the track has sample dependencies.
